title: Bloomberg Markets: Chart of the Day, Eco Brief for Sept. 25
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Chart of the Day, Eco Brief for Sept. 25
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Carl Riccadonna\u0010Chief US Economist\u0010Bloomberg Intelligence\u0010Discussing the markets and economy with Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson, who also discusses his Chart of the Day "Gold's gain signals the U.S. looks riskier to investors." Email Dave at DWilson@bloomberg.net to sign up for the Chart.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
